formFields.labelZh: OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN(与OPENAI API KEY至少填一个)
formFields.labelEn: OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN (fill in at least one with OPENAI API KEY)

formFields.labelZh: API反向代理，可选(OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN时默认启用,需要注意可用性)
formFields.labelEn: API reverse proxy, optional (enabled by default when OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN, need to pay attention to availability)

formFields.labelZh: OPENAI API KEY(与OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN至少填一个)
formFields.labelEn: OPENAI API KEY (fill in at least one with OPENAI ACCESS TOKEN)

formFields.labelZh: API模型，可选，设置OPENAI API KEY时可用(https://platform.openai.com/docs/models)
formFields.labelEn: API model, optional, available when setting OPENAI API KEY(https://platform.openai.com/docs/models)

formFields.labelZh: API接口地址，可选，设置OPENAI API KEY时可用
formFields.labelEn: API interface address, optional, available when setting OPENAI API KEY

formFields.labelZh: 访问权限密钥，可选(强烈建议填写)
每小时最大请求次数，可选，默认无限
formFields.labelEn: Maximum number of requests per hour, optional, default unlimited

formFields.labelZh: Socks代理地址，可选，和Socks代理端口一起时生效
formFields.labelEn: Socks proxy address, optional, effective when combined with Socks proxy port

formFields.labelZh: Socks代理端口，可选，和Socks代理地址一起时生效
formFields.labelEn: Socks proxy port, optional, effective when combined with Socks proxy address

formFields.labelZh: Socks代理用户名，可选，和Socks代理地址一起时生效
formFields.labelEn: Socks proxy user name, optional, effective when combined with Socks proxy address

formFields.labelZh: Socks代理密码，可选，和Socks代理地址一起时生效
formFields.labelEn: Socks proxy password, optional, effective when combined with Socks proxy address
HTTPS proxy, optional, supports http, https, socks5

formFields.default: 这是一个提示/This is a tip
